about.title: About Me
about.text: Hi! I'm Virginia, a junior web developer eager to learn and grow in the tech world. I'm currently finishing a Higher Vocational Training program in Web Development. I’m organized, solution-oriented, and adapt well to teamwork. I'm looking for an opportunity to keep learning, contribute from day one, and grow as a developer in a collaborative environment.
